root: ^Lorraine Florace: Hey, kid, need something? Tea? Medicine? Or, yeah I guess you can have silk as well. But quickly, Sam’s daughter’s water broke and I need the shop ready to take care of that. Can’t you see? Without this shop, there is no Steadville. It’s the beating heart of the town. No silk, no Steadvillian cheer, no Steadville. So, I’ll keep making my own silk in the farm, so remember to keep that up, and send me some people as well. I could always use more hands here.
^The silk shop is the epicenter of Steadville: It produces all the moral of the town. Keep it well equipped in silk from the Silk Farm, and Citizens.
